General.Name: Warteck Invest Ltd
General.Description: Warteck Invest AG engages in the rental of real estate properties in Switzerland. The company operates in residential properties, mixed-use properties, and development projects, as well as commercial properties, such as office and retail properties. Its portfolio consists of 57 properties in 11 cantons. Warteck Invest AG was founded in 1856 and is headquartered in Basel, Switzerland.
